briefTitle: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TQB2102 for Injection Versus Investigator-Selected Chemotherapy in HER2 Low-Expressing Recurrent/Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open, Parallel-Controlled Phase III Clinical Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of TQB2102 for Injection Versus Investigator-Selected Chemotherapy in HER2 Low-Expressing Recurrent/Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Progression-free survival (PFS) in subjects with HR-positive, HER2 low-expressing recurrent/metastatic breast cancer as assessed by Independent Review Committee (IRC)
